title: PREVIEW: Smyrna at Riverdale Football
text:
In terms of playoff seeding, there's not a bigger game in Region 2-6A than Smyrna at Riverdale. NewsRadio WGNS' Bryan Barrett has more on this key matchup... 

Smyrna is 4-and-1 in the region and with last week's win over Cookeville, positioned themselves for a home playoff game. However, Smyrna coach Matt Williams says last week's win over Cookeville allowed them to keep their goals in front of them with the Warriors looming... 

The Warriors are coming off a loss to Oakland and are 3-and-2 in region play. They have the same opportunity Smyrna did last week and Riverdale coach Ron Aydelott knows they'll have their hands full... 

With Smyrna hosting Oakland next week and Riverdale hosting Cookeville, the region standings are still very much in the air. Tonight's game will go a long way in clearing things up going into the last week of the regular season. 
State Farm Prep Football coverage from Tomahawk Stadium begins at 6 with the Thompson Services Friday Night Thunder Pregame Show. The DIRECTV by EnterSource Pregame Show begins at 6:30 with kickoff of Smyrna at Riverdale at 7. Related Articles
